      • startMagnetometerCalibration

        public static void startMagnetometerCalibration(Drone drone,
                                boolean retryOnFailure,
                                boolean saveAutomatically,
                                int startDelay)
        Start the magnetometer calibration process
        Parameters:
        drone - vehicle to calibrate
        retryOnFailure - if true, automatically retry the magnetometer calibration if it fails
        saveAutomatically - if true, save the calibration automatically without user input.
        startDelay - positive delay in seconds before starting the calibration
